Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura entered the game with just over two minutes left and received encouragement from the crowd and teammates
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura expressed that he could have done more and will continue to work hard every day
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kawamura missed both 3-point attempts and had a turnover in his two minutes of play
He is the second Japanese player in Grizzlies' history, joining Yuta Watanabe
